item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar and restaurant scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Lili Marlene's on Atwells Ave. located a little past the all the other places on the Hill and across from the Blind King (that's window blinds - lol!)and Tammany Hall.

So, one of our trendy insider members said - "the only way you'll know its a bar is because everyone is standing outside smoking" - very trendy and hush-hush. Hmmmmm, well, maybe its undiscovered, but the crowd in the know already knows about it. P-Collective first and second-timers, you'll remember where it is and if you don't know about it yet, its worth knowing about.........So let's check it out!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing some kind of scarf, but we're not hard to find!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Lili Marlene's!
